description:
If you have no previous martial arts experience and you want to learn how to defend yourself safely, and effectively at a time and place that's perfect for you, than this Practical Self Defense course is right for you.

When you purchase this Practical Self Defense program, you'll have access to detailed video instruction on every technique in the course, enabling you to study and learn the lessons 24 hours a day! You'll see that each of the lessons are based on real life scenarios that are realistic and most likely to be encountered. When you sign up for Practical Self Defense, you will begin learning the skills required to protect yourself and others effectively right away. The course is designed to be learned and practiced at your pace, not at the pace of an instructor.

Keep Yourself and Loved Ones Safe Using Basic, Memorable Self Defense

  • Learn how to recognize dangerous situations
  • Learn how to practice self defense at home with a partner
  • Learn online at home or at work when convenient

Self Defense Practical Enough to be Useful

If you're taking thinking of taking this course, you've either had a close call or something in your life is telling you to get prepared to protect yourself. This course consists of a series of calm videos that will explore proven basic self-defense as well as how to see emergencies early enough to avoid them.

Content Overview

This course is focused on supplying you with confidence in all situations, regardless of your body type or prior self-defense training. We know that unless a person reviews and practices particular skills on a regular basis, they may not feel confident in what to do during an emergency. That's why we've designed this course to always available and always able to be practiced at a time and location that's best for you. Pepper spray is one of the very first lessons taught and that's protection that doesn't require much practice but can save your life immediately.

We Designed It To Be Basic and Practical On Purpose

You will learn how to deter potential attacks, identify unsafe situations from a safe distance, use pepper spray effectively and how to use multiple parts of your body as weapons for self defense. We hope that you'll never need to use hand to hand combat but in the case that you do, we'll teach you some incredibly effective and threat neutralizing strikes that will give you the confidence to live life more freely.

When we say practical,we mean it. Your safety is our goal.
title: Practical Self Defense: Effective Self Defense Training
